read_text: Visit our ideas page to reflect, share, and connect.
meet_text: For more information you can schedule a free preliminary information meeting
meet_text_discuss: To discuss more of this topic with us you can schedule a free meeting

common_training_faq.question: Will a certificate be given at the end of the training?
common_training_faq.answer: No, we do not provide a certificate at the end of the training because we believe certificates and diplomas are outdated. However, if you need proof of attendance, we can prepare a document for you.

common_training_faq.question: Can we also take it as a classroom training in addition to distance learning?
common_training_faq.answer: Yes, we can also plan it as a face-to-face classroom training when the number of people is sufficient.

common_training_faq.question: May I request to retake the training?
